## Setup
```{r, include=TRUE}
sample <- read.csv("../datasets/sample.csv")
print(sample)
```


```{r, include=TRUE}
library(GGally)
babies <- na.omit(read.csv('babies.csv'))
babies$parity <- as.factor(babies$parity)
babies$smoke <- as.factor(babies$smoke)
babies.dat <- babies[, c("gestation", "parity", "age", "height","weight", "smoke", "bwt")]
ggpairs(data = babies.dat)
ggcorr(data = babies.dat, label = TRUE)
```
